text: Inni Isa samiifi dachii guyyoota jaha keessatti uumee; ergasii ‘Arshii’ irratti (ol ta’iinsa isaafmalu) ol ta’eedhaWaan dachii keessa gadi seenuufi waan ishee irraa ba’u, waan samii irraa bu’uufi waan ishee keessa ol ba’us ni beekaInni eessallee yoo jiraattan isin waliin jiraRabbiin waan isin dalagdan hunda ni arga
